intro: Play. Score. Win. Become a Football Legend!
description:
Football Legends 2025 brings the thrill of the world’s most popular sport to your Nintendo Switch™!

Step onto the pitch and experience pure football excitement across multiple game modes and stadiums.

Play a Quick Match for instant action — perfect for a fast-paced challenge alone or with friends in local multiplayer.

Want more control? Choose the Single Match mode to select your favorite team, stadium, weather, and time of day — and compete head-to-head with friends or AI opponents.

Take on the ultimate challenge in Tournament Mode, where 16 elite teams battle for glory. Only the best can lift the trophy!

Multiple stadiums, each offering customizable weather conditions — from sunny afternoons to rainy nights under the floodlights.

Get ready to kick off, score spectacular goals, and become a true Football Legend!
